title: The River's Measure
tagline: A nation's soul is forged where the forest meets the future.
themes: The Agency of the Natural World

chapters.title: The Whisper in the Cocoa Groves
Teaching the Map and the Territory
A New Grammar for the Land

story: Write a scene where a character must translate a colonial legal document for an elder, grappling with concepts that have no equivalent in their native tongue.
Create a monologue from the perspective of the Volta River, observing the changes from Kwame's childhood to the construction of the dam.
Draft a letter from Adowa to a pen-pal in another newly independent African nation, comparing their struggles with 'development'.
Imagine a folk tale Old Man Hama would tell about the spirit of a bulldozer, and how to appease or outwit it.
technical: Build an interactive map that layers colonial-era boundaries over indigenous place names and ecological features, allowing users to toggle between 'official' and 'lived' geography.
Design a text-based game where the player, as a village council, must make choices balancing immediate material 'progress' against long-term cultural and environmental costs.

cover_prompt: A colossal, ancient baobab tree, its roots like river deltas and its trunk a living map of scars, actively pushes back against the geometric grid of a neon-lit, futuristic city encroaching upon its sacred grove, [Detailed Scene & Context: in a twilight zone where bioluminescent fungi meet holographic projections, and surveyor's stakes are entwined with resilient vines, depicting the tense frontier between primal forest and arrogant progress], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric, mythic-realist style of Wangechi Mutu's collages and the epic, textured environmental storytelling of Thomas Cole's Hudson River School, rendered as a hyper-detailed matte painting], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and powerful composition looking up at the defiant tree, a low-angle shot that emphasizes its monumental scale against the synthetic skyline], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a clash of color temperatures: the warm, deep amber and viridian greens of the forest interior versus the cold, electric blues and violets of the city, all under a bruised twilight sky], [Quality & Technical Enforcers: masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev].
